"How plainly all these young people wear their hearts on their sleeves!" said Anna Mi- khdylovna, pointing to Nicholas as he went out. "Cousinage dangereux voisinage" 1 she added. 
"Yes," said the countess when the brightness these young people had brought into the room had vanished; and as if answering a question no one had put but which was always in her mind, "and how much suffering, how much
